entry.title: STORM BRINGS JUST OVER 1.50 INCHES OF RAIN TO ROSEBURG

entry.summary: The Umpqua River has been roaring for the past couple of days, as heavy rainfall the previous week led to rising river stages — the water level of rivers measured above their baseflow conditions — across the Pacific Northwest.
